name: Three-star shootout
description:
The good, the bad and the ugly, three alien cowboys, shoot it out on a mysterious desert planet to see who owns it.

Created during the LvlUpGamejam, with the theme "The good, the bad and the ugly", we used both constraints "Use of AI tools" and "1 keyboard, N players".

Midjourney and ChatGPT were the tools most used during the developpement.

Controls:

The Good:

Movement: WASD

Shoting and special skill: Q & E

The Ugly:
Movement: IJKL
Shoting and special skill: U & O

The Bad:
Movement: 8456
Shoting and special skill: 7 & 9

Space (everybody) explodes the thumbleweeds
